to_if_alone.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {option down, command down}'

to.shell_command: osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to keystroke "m" using {option down, command down}'
osascript -e 'tell application "System Events" to set visible of (every process whose visible is true and name is not "Google Chrome") to false';open -a 'Google Chrome'
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap south || $(yabai -m window --display south; yabai -m display --focus south)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap north || $(yabai -m window --display north; yabai -m display --focus north)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap west || $(yabai -m window --display west; yabai -m display --focus west)
/opt/homebrew/bin/yabai -m window --swap east || $(yabai -m window --display east; yabai -m display --focus east)
